name: KendoGarurumon
effect: You may digivolve this card from your hand onto one of your blue Tamers as if the Tamer is a level 3 blue Digimon for a memory cost of 2. [When Digivolving] If a card with [Hybrid] in its traits or [Koji Minamoto] is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, this Digimon gains ＜Jamming＞ for the turn. (This Digimon can't be deleted in battles against Security Digimon.)
